MemberSignature.Value: public void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (string targetDomainName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword);

.method public hidebysig instance void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(string targetDomainName, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword) cil managed
Public Sub CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (targetDomainName As String, direction As TrustDirection, trustPassword As String)
public: void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(System::String ^ targetDomainName, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::TrustDirection direction, System::String ^ trustPassword);

param.name: targetDomainName
param.span: The DNS name of the domain that the trust is created with.

span.span: The DNS name of the domain that the trust is created with.

param.name: direction
param.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this domain.

span.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this domain.

param.name: trustPassword
param.span: The password for the trust.

span.span: The password for the trust.

summary.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

span.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questo metodo crea un lato di una relazione di trust.This method creates one side of a trust relationship. La relazione di trust è stabilito fino a quando non sono stati creati entrambi i lati del trust.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created. Il `trustPassword` parametro associa una password di trust creato.The `trustPassword` parameter associates a password with the created trust. Quando viene creato l'altro lato della relazione di trust, viene fornita la stessa password e le due relazioni di trust locale vengono quindi associati tra loro.When the other side of the trust is created, the same password is provided and the two local trusts are then bound to each other. Per creare a livello di programmazione entrambi i lati di una relazione di trust in una singola chiamata al metodo, usare il (metodo).To programmatically create both sides of a trust relationship in a single method call, use the method.

exception.span: The trust relationship already exists.

span.span: The trust relationship already exists.

exception.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

summary.span: Creates both sides of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

span.span: Creates both sides of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questo metodo crea entrambi i lati di una relazione di trust con una singola chiamata al metodo.This method creates both sides of a trust relationship with a single method call. Il metodo viene utilizzato per creare un solo lato di una relazione di trust.The method is used to create only one side of a trust.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers() cil managed

summary.span: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain.

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain.

returns.span: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

span.span: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks È possibile trovare i controller di dominio individuabili cercando i record SRV in DNS.You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records. Questo metodo restituirà solo i controller di dominio che registrano il generico, non specifico del sito, i record SRV controller di dominio.Only those domain controllers that register the generic, non-site-specific, domain controller SRV record will be returned by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers(string siteName) cil managed
Public Function FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers (siteName As String) As DomainControllerCollection

param.name: siteName
param.span: The name of the site to search for the domain controllers.

span.span: The name of the site to search for the domain controllers.

summary.span: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain that are also in the specified site.

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain that are also in the specified site.

returns.span: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

span.span: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks È possibile trovare i controller di dominio individuabili cercando i record SRV in DNS.You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records. Se un controller di dominio non registra un record SRV per il sito specificato, non viene restituito da questo metodo, anche se il controller di dominio è situato fisicamente all'interno di tale sito.If a domain controller does not register an SRV record for the specified site, it will not be returned by this method, even if the domain controller is physically located within that site. Tutti i controller di dominio che registrano un record SRV per il sito specificato verranno restituiti da questo metodo, anche se non sono situati fisicamente all'interno di tale sito.All domain controllers that register an SRV record for the specified site will be returned by this method, even if they are not physically located within that site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questo metodo consente di trovare qualsiasi controller di dominio nel dominio.This method finds any domain controller in the domain. Non c'è garanzia che saranno trovati da un'altra chiamata a questo metodo di stesso controller di dominio.There is no guarantee that the same domain controller will be found by another call to this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain GetComputerDomain() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetComputerDomain () As Domain

summary.span: Gets the object that represents the domain to which the local computer is joined.

span.span: Gets the object that represents the domain to which the local computer is joined.

returns.span: A object that represents the domain to which the local machine is joined.

span.span: A object that represents the domain to which the local machine is joined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il valore restituito di metodo è un oggetto che rappresenta il dominio a cui viene aggiunto il computer che esegue l'applicazione.The return value of the method is a object representing the domain to which the computer running the application is joined. Questo valore restituito è indipendente dalle credenziali di dominio con cui viene eseguita l'applicazione.This return value is independent of the domain credentials under which the application is run. Questo metodo recupera il dominio del computer indipendentemente dalle credenziali di dominio account attendibile per l'esecuzione.This method will retrieve the computer's domain regardless of the trusted account domain credentials it is run under. Per recuperare il oggetto che rappresenta il dominio corrispondente all'utente le credenziali in vigore per il contesto di sicurezza in cui viene eseguita l'applicazione, usare il metodo invece.To retrieve the object that represents the domain corresponding to the user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running, use the method instead.

exception.span: A connection to the domain could not be made.

span.span: A connection to the domain could not be made.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain GetCurrentDomain() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetCurrentDomain () As Domain

summary.span: Gets the object for the current user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

span.span: Gets the object for the current user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

returns.span: A object that represents the domain for the specified user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

span.span: A object that represents the domain for the specified user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks metodo è determinato dalle credenziali di dominio in cui viene eseguita l'applicazione. method is determined by the domain credentials under which the application is running. Per recuperare il oggetto che rappresenta il dominio a cui il computer che esegue l'applicazione sono stato aggiunto, indipendentemente dal fatto le credenziali associate all'applicazione, usare il metodo invece.To retrieve the object representing the domain to which the computer running the application is joined, regardless of the credentials associated with that application, use the method instead. ## Vedere ancheSee Also

exception.span: A connection to the current context could not be made.

span.span: A connection to the current context could not be made.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RaiseDomainFunctionality(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode domainMode) cil managed

param.name: domainMode
param.span: An enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the domain.

span.span: An enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the domain.

summary.span: Raises the mode of operation for the domain.

span.span: Raises the mode of operation for the domain.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Il valore può essere generato ma non ridotto.The value can be raised but not lowered. Ciò significa che l'aumento del livello di funzionalità del dominio non è reversibile e la decisione di eseguire questa operazione deve essere apportata con attenzione.This means that raising the functionality level of the domain is not reversible and the decision to do this should be made carefully. Per altre informazioni sulle modalità operative del dominio, vedere [funzionalità del dominio e foresta](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp).For more information about domain operational modes, see [Domain and forest functionality](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp). Nella tabella seguente definisce i valori validi per `domainMode` in base alla modalità operativa corrente del dominio.The following table defines the valid values for `domainMode` based on the current operating mode of the domain. |Modalità correnteCurrent mode|Modalità può essere generata perMode can be raised to| |------------------|---------------------------| ||



| ||| ||| ||nessunoNone|

summary.span: Repairs a trust relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questo metodo consente di ripristinare il trust reimpostando il canale sicuro per la relazione di trust.This method repairs the trust by resetting the secure channel for the trust. Se l'operazione non riesce a reimpostare il canale protetto, quindi anche reimposterà la password di trust.If the operation fails to reset the secure channel, then it will also reset the trust password.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void VerifyOutboundTrustRelationship(string targetDomainName) cil managed

param.name: targetDomainName
param.span: The DNS name of the domain with which the trust exists.

span.span: The DNS name of the domain with which the trust exists.

summary.span: Verifies that a previously established outbound trust with the specified domain is valid.

span.span: Verifies that a previously established outbound trust with the specified domain is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questo metodo viene utilizzato per verificare che una relazione di trust è stata stabilita completamente.This method is used to verify that a trust relationship has been fully established. La relazione di trust è stabilito fino a quando non sono stati creati entrambi i lati del trust.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void VerifyTrustRelationship(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain targetDomain, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction) cil managed
Public Sub VerifyTrustRelationship (targetDomain As Domain, direction As TrustDirection)

param.name: targetDomain
param.span: A object that represents the domain with which the trust exists.

span.span: A object that represents the domain with which the trust exists.

param.name: direction
param.span: A value that specifies the direction, relative to this domain, of the trust.

span.span: A value that specifies the direction, relative to this domain, of the trust.

summary.span: Verifies that a previously established trust with the specified domain is valid.

span.span: Verifies that a previously established trust with the specified domain is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questo metodo verifica che una relazione di trust è stata stabilita completamente.This method verifies that a trust relationship has been fully established. La relazione di trust è stabilito fino a quando non sono stati creati entrambi i lati del trust.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.
